Articles.Content: Does anyone know where C7 is going? I still remember when his mod pack first came out and how cool it was to see him join the dev team.
I read something about Universe Sandbox 2. I'll miss him.

I read something about Universe Sandbox 2. I'll miss him.

I would say that is a win for the community, as Universe Sandbox is pretty awesome too and very much related to anything space.
the better question is, what does he know about upcoming updates, and does he leave the window over the kitchen sink unlocked so we can ask him.

I read something about Universe Sandbox 2. I'll miss him.

They're making another!

If C7 is leaving I hope they hire Bac9

They're making another!

If C7 is leaving I hope they hire Bac9

Bac9 was already a developer, but apparently he has also stepped down.

Oh, awww. I must have forgotten at some point. Well, someone from the modding community.

As for Chad, yes, he's going to be developping Universe Sandbox 2 http://universesandbox.com/forum/index.php/topic,12335.0.html

Your profile pic shows my reaction pretty accurately.

Edited June 9, 2014 by Spartwo

Bac9 was already a developer, but apparently he has also stepped down.

Yes he was, but he was only part time during his free time and the weekends. Now he's working for an architecture firm if I remember correctly, and doesn't have enough time for KSP anymore.

As for Chad, yes, he's going to be developping Universe Sandbox 2 http://universesandbox.com/forum/index.php/topic,12335.0.html
hearing that he's working for an architecture firm is quite appropriate sounding. I hope he included the KSC buildings in his resume

Thanks for the link to the Universe Sandbox forum stupid_cris. I had read that in the initial post was wasn't sure it was true.

Maybe C7 likes birthing space games.

Now I can look forward to Universe Sandbox 2!

- - - Updated - - -

I'm nearly 100% sure those were designed by Bac9.

anyone?

I'm going to miss him. I loved all of his spaceplane parts, back from the good old 0.11-0.12 days. What? No, that's not a tear!

Good luck with Universe Sandbox, Chad.

I am going to miss him. He was a great developer, then again he is going to be a great developer for this. Hearing that he is going to work for Universe Sandbox 2 is making me excited because I saw some of the videos and screenshots of it and it looks awesome! Good luck Chad!
